# ==============================================
# CHAMBERS PROTOCOL - SECURITY & HYGIENE
# ==============================================

# 1. SECRETS (CRITICAL)
# Never upload API keys or environment configs
.env
.env.local
.env.*

# 2. FINANCIAL DATA (CRITICAL)
# Do not upload the local tax ledger or audit logs
fidelity_ledger.json
fidelity_ledger_*.json

# 3. PYTHON VIRTUAL ENVIRONMENTS
# These are local to your machine
venv/
.venv/
env/
.env/

# 4. PYTHON CACHE & COMPILED FILES
# Junk files generated by running the code
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd
.Python
*.egg-info/
dist/
build/

# 5. IDE SETTINGS
# Don't share your personal editor configs
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp

# 6. SYSTEM FILES
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
